summary: This module supplies utilities for configuring, pruning, estimating performance, and launching tiled matrix‑multiplication kernels built with Triton. It defines a collection of kernel configurations for various data types and hardware constraints, and provides helper routines that select optimal configurations and invoke the Triton kernels for efficient GPU matmul.
business_intent: To accelerate transformer and other deep‑learning workloads by delivering high‑performance, low‑latency matrix‑multiplication kernels on GPUs, thereby reducing training and inference time and improving resource utilization.
